data.message: Can you tell me what's up with the guy claiming to work at Facebook HQ and saying that I won the Facebook online lottery? He sent me a friend request and has been messaging me about this for a little bit today.

replies.message: I have been trying to find a way to contact Fb HQ ever since I started talking to the guy and finally came across this page.

Hi Crystal, we're sorry you are experiencing this on Facebook. This is a known hoax. Please report this message as spam by going to the conversation, clicking the gear icon in the upper-right corner and select Report as Spam. Thank you! -Elisha

Thank you for that. Is there a number or anything to be able to contact FB HQ? People should be allowed to put that they work there on their profiles! and this isn't allowing me to post his picture with this comment.
Thank you for the feedback Crystal. You don't need to put in his picture in the report. Just reporting his comment will provide us with the information needed. -Elisha

Ok. Well I sent a message to this page of a screen shot of the guys page before you replied to this. I believe that there should be a way to block people from putting that they work for Facebook on their pages.
